amendment.description: To impose a civil penalty for the closure of an airport without sufficient notice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 921 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 921 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S7814; text: CR S7814) To impose a civil penalty for the closure of an airport without sufficient notice.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 921 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 921 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Harkin.
